name: DreamHopper - Jamfuser 2020 Entry
description:
This is  DreamHopper!

Enter the story of a grasshopper who can't jump - but gains the ability to leap through his dreams!

This game was made during Jamfuser 2020, a 72 hour game jam hosted by Tranzfuser. Massive thanks to the team at Tranzfuser/UK Games Fund for all the support!

DreamHopper was made by:

Alex Turnbull - Team Lead | Programmer - @_alexturnbull

Jayden Murray - VFX Artist | Designer - @_JaydenMurray

Sean Turner - Artist | Designer - @seanturnerGD

Katie Millar - Composer | Artist | Designer - @sparrowdust_dev

Contact:

You can visit us at  http://monkeyhat.games/ .
